Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span> activates ''Dragon's Grip'' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>''':
* The first Survivor interacting with the damaged Generator will scream, revealing their location for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 seconds</span>''', and suffer from the '''''Exposed<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">60 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Dragon's Grip'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">120</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">80</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator activates Dragon's Grip for the next 30 seconds:
  • The first Survivor interacting with the damaged Generator will scream, revealing their location for 4 seconds, and suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds.

Dragon's Grip has a cool-down of 120/100/80 seconds.

"Such potential in this compound... even the slightest trace causes unnatural effects." — Journal of Talbot Grimes

Dying Light

Each time you hook a Survivor other than your '''''Obsession<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span>''''', you gain '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''':
* For as long as the '''''Obsession''''' is alive, all other Survivors suffer from a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">2.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''&#37;''' penalty to Repairing, Healing, and Sabotaging speeds per Token, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">22</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">27.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">33</span>''' '''&#37;''' or '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">11 Tokens</span>'''.
* The '''''Obsession''''' is unaffected by this penalty and instead granted a permanent '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">+33 %</span>''' Action Speed bonus to Unhooking and Healing other Survivors.
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

Each time you hook a Survivor other than your Obsession, you gain 1 Token:
  • For as long as the Obsession is alive, all other Survivors suffer from a stack-able 2/2.5/3 % penalty to Repairing, Healing, and Sabotaging speeds per Token, up to a maximum of 22/27.5/33 % or 11 Tokens.
  • The Obsession is unaffected by this penalty and instead granted a permanent +33 % Action Speed bonus to Unhooking and Healing other Survivors.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Eruption

The NE-α parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span> applies ''Eruption'':
*All affected Generators are highlighted to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.
*The next time any Survivor<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none; width:24px;max-height: 24px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span> enters the Dying State<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span> by any means, all affected Generators explode and immediately start regressing, which removes the highlighted Aura.
*'''Instantly regresses''' the Generator by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">-10 %</span>''' of its maximum possible Progression.
*Causes all Survivors repairing the afflicted Generators to scream and reveal their Aura<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span> to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">10</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">12</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''Eruption'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.

The NE-α parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator applies Eruption:

  • All affected Generators are highlighted to you in yellow.
  • The next time any Survivor enters the Dying State by any means, all affected Generators explode and immediately start regressing, which removes the highlighted Aura.
  • Instantly regresses the Generator by -10 % of its maximum possible Progression.
  • Causes all Survivors repairing the afflicted Generators to scream and reveal their Aura to you for 8/10/12 seconds.
Eruption has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

A Hex rooting its power on hope.

You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.

Once the Exit Gates are powered, if there is still a Dull Totem remaining on the Map, Hex: No One Escapes Death activates and lights it:

  • Increases your Movement speed by 2/3/4 %.
  • Survivors suffer from a permanent Exposed Status Effect.

Hex: No One Escapes Death remains inactive if no Dull Totems are available.

Once the Status Effect is revealed to Survivors, Hex: No One Escapes Death reveals the Aura of its Hex Totem to all Survivors within 4 metres and gradually expands that range to 24 metres over the course of 30 seconds.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"And the beast became faster and more powerful as if The Entity's shadowy whips were lashing at its back."

*'''<span class="luaClr clr clr13" style="color: #418284;">5 Totems</span>''': all Totems are permanently blocked by The Entity<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span>.

You reveal the true power of the Totems, hidden within their remains.
  • You see the Auras of cleansed Totems.

You can perform a ritual on a cleansed Totem to resurrect it as a Rekindled Totem.
For each Rekindled Totem active at the same time, Hex: Pentimento gains an additional effect:

  • 1 Totem: reduces all Survivors' Repair speed by 20/25/30 %.
  • 2 Totems: reduces all Survivors' Healing speed by 20/25/30 %.
  • 3 Totems: reduces all Survivors' Recovery speed from being downed by 20/25/30 %.
  • 4 Totems: reduces all Survivors' Exit Gate Opening speed by 20/25/30 %.
  • 5 Totems: all Totems are permanently blocked by The Entity.

When a Rekindled Totem is cleansed, its remains are consumed by The Entity and it cannot be rekindled.

 Blight
Hoarder

You protect what little you have and are perceptive to those rummaging through your stockpiles.

''Hoarder'' triggers a ''Loud Noise Notification'' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 seconds</span>''', whenever a Survivor performs any of the following actions within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">48</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">64</span>''' '''metres''' of your location:
* Unlocks a Chest<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span>.
* Picks up any Item<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span>.
<p>''Hoarder'' spawns '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">2 additional Chests</span>''' in the Trial.

You protect what little you have and are perceptive to those rummaging through your stockpiles.

Hoarder triggers a Loud Noise Notification for 4 seconds, whenever a Survivor performs any of the following actions within 32/48/64 metres of your location:

  • Unlocks a Chest.
  • Picks up any Item.

Hoarder spawns 2 additional Chests in the Trial.

* Grants the '''''Undetectable<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">14</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">16</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Tinkerer'' can only trigger once per Generator per Trial.

Whenever a Generator is repaired to 70 %, you benefit from the following effects:
  • Triggers a Loud Noise Notification for that Generator, revealing its location.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for the next 12/14/16 seconds.

Tinkerer can only trigger once per Generator per Trial.

Trail of Torment

You guide your victims along a path of pain and punishment.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span> activates ''Trail of Torment'':
*'''Grants''' the '''''Undetectable<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' until the Generator stops regressing.
*The Aura<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span> of the damaged Generator is revealed to all Survivors in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.


<p>''Trail of Torment'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">70</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You guide your victims along a path of pain and punishment.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator activates Trail of Torment:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect until the Generator stops regressing.
  • The Aura of the damaged Generator is revealed to all Survivors in yellow.

Trail of Torment has a cool-down of 80/70/60 seconds.

When they spot you, they know the end is near.
<p>Whenever you open a Locker, ''Ultimate Weapon'' activates for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>''':
*Survivors entering your Terror Radius<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span> scream and reveal their location to you.
*Survivors entering your ''Terror Radius'' also suffer from the '''''Blindness<span class = "iconLink" style = "vertical-align: middle; padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none; width:32px;max-height: 32px" class = "pcView pcIconLink"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText iconless"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView mobileIconLink"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">30 seconds</span>'''.

When they spot you, they know the end is near.

  • Survivors entering your Terror Radius scream and reveal their location to you.
  • Survivors entering your Terror Radius also suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.
Ultimate Weapon has a cool-down of 40/35/30 seconds.
